archimate:InformationChain.name: Information Chain / Service Risk Profile
archimate:InformationChain.documentation: The Information Chain (sometimes refered to as a Service Risk Profile) is a process that describes what information is required or is being used by a journey in the achievement of its aims. It can contain Information Element or Data Objects. Each information element or data object should have characteristics that describe its purpose, source, target and sensitivity. Described correctly these should allow us to do an initial assessment of the risk associated with each transaction and the service as a whole.
